Text: ...Guys, I just want to thank you for your efforts. Even though I don't need the HD versions, you have managed to catch at least one file every week that some of the other collection torrents miss. Again, know that at least this one unashamed leech appreciates your work!
You're quite welcome.  I'm glad you enjoy.  Thank you for your kind words and your continued patronage. :)
yes Scalped in trades! didn't even know i wanted this, but now i need this! thanks RubrumPopulus!
...Heh, as much as our favorite british person hyped "Scalped", you mean you really didn't know you wanted it?? :)
